latestAction.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary. (text: CR S1358)

title: A resolution expressing support for the designation of February 23, 2025, to March 1, 2025, as "National Fentanyl Awareness Week" and raising awareness of the negative impacts of fentanyl in the United States.
ai_summary: February 23, 2025 to March 1, 2025, to be "National Fentanyl Awareness Week" A resolution expresses support for the designation of the week. The resolution also raises awareness of the negative impacts of fentanyl in the U.S. and raising awareness of its role in drug overdose deaths. A resolution expressing support for a designation of February 23, 25th to March 25th as National F fentanyl Awareness Week, also known as "Fentanyl Awareness Day" and "F fentanyl Awareness Month"
